5 use Ubiquity\utils\http\URequest;

7 use Ubiquity\utils\flash\FlashMessage;

15 class AuthControllerCoreTrait {
16  abstract public function loadView($viewName, $pData = NULL, $asString = false);
17  abstract protected function attemptsTimeout();
18  abstract protected function getFiles ():AuthFiles;
19  abstract public function _getBodySelector();
20  abstract public function _getBaseRoute();
21 
22  protected function getBaseUrl(){
23  return URequest::getUrl($this->_getBaseRoute());
24  }
25 
26  public function message($type,$header,$body,$icon="info",$id=null){
27  return $this->loadView($this->_getFiles()->getViewMessage(),get_defined_vars(),true);
28  }
29 
30  protected function fMessage(FlashMessage $fMessage,$id=null){
31  return $this->message($fMessage->getType(), $fMessage->getTitle(), $fMessage->getContent(),$fMessage->getIcon(),$id);
32  }
33 
34  protected function noAttempts(){
35  $timeout=$this->attemptsTimeout();
36  $plus="";
37  if(is_numeric($timeout)){
38  $this->jquery->exec("$('._login').addClass('disabled');",true);
39  $plus=" You can try again {_timer}";
40  $this->jquery->exec("var startTimer=function(duration, display) {var timer = duration, minutes, seconds;
41  var interval=setInterval(function () {
42  minutes = parseInt(timer / 60, 10);seconds = parseInt(timer % 60, 10);
43  minutes = minutes < 10 ? '0' + minutes : minutes;
44  seconds = seconds < 10 ? '0' + seconds : seconds;
45  display.html(minutes + ':' + seconds);
46  if (--timer < 0) {clearInterval(interval);$('#timeout-message').hide();$('#bad-login').removeClass('attached');$('._login').removeClass('disabled');}
47  }, 1000);
48  }",true);
49  $timeToLeft=USession::getTimeout($this->_attemptsSessionKey);
50  $this->jquery->exec("startTimer({$timeToLeft},$('#timer'));",true);
51  $this->jquery->compile($this->view);
52  }
53  return new FlashMessage("<i class='ui warning icon'></i> You have no more attempt of connection !".$plus,null,"bottom attached error","");
54  }
55 
56 
57  protected function authLoadView($viewName,$vars=[]){
58  $files=$this->_getFiles();
59  $mainTemplate=$files->getBaseTemplate();
60  if(isset($mainTemplate)){
61  $vars["_viewname"]=$viewName;
62  $vars["_base"]=$mainTemplate;
63  $this->loadView($files->getViewBaseTemplate(),$vars);
64  }else{
65  $this->loadView($viewName,$vars);
66  }
67  }
68 
69  protected function getOriginalURL(){
70  return USession::get("urlParts");
71  }
72 
73  protected function _getFiles():AuthFiles{
74  if(!isset($this->authFiles)){
75  $this->authFiles=$this->getFiles();
76  }
77  return $this->authFiles;
78  }
79 
80  protected function getViewVars($viewname){
81  return ["authURL"=>$this->getBaseUrl(),"bodySelector"=>$this->_getBodySelector(),"_loginCaption"=>$this->_loginCaption];
82  }
83 }
